Query 1:
 select * from ChessBoard;

Statement prepared.
rownum row_id 

0 1049104 
1 1049160 
2 1049216 
3 1049272 
4 1049328 
5 1049384 
6 1049440 
7 1049496 

Done

Query 2:
 select * from ChessRow;

Statement prepared.
base rownum name color 


Library used incorrectly

Query 3:
 select * from ChessBoard,ChessRow where ChessRow.base=ChessBoard.row_id

Query 4:
 select * from ChessBoard,ChessRow where ChessRow.base=ChessBoard.row_id and color="white" and name="bishop";

Statement prepared.
rownum row_id base rownum name color 

0 1049104 1049104 2 bishop white 
0 1049104 1049104 5 bishop white 

Done
